body_html: Unfortunately we don't test on 32-bit x86 here, since it's not an officially supported platform and we don't have machines set up, so it's hard for us to do a fix. We'd welcome a PR with an update though, I'm guessing adding the right macro check at [1] would get things running?

body: Unfortunately we don't test on 32-bit x86 here, since it's not an officially supported platform and we don't have machines set up, so it's hard for us to do a fix. We'd welcome a PR with an update though, I'm guessing adding the right macro check at [1] would get things running?
